txt.en: 'Any map of the tunnels beneath Emyn Ernil has long since been lost. That makes exploration a dangerous endeavour. The tunnels are a maze of twists and turns, intersections and dead-ends. It is easy to find yourself suddenly turned around and lost.\n\n'There are beams to be found amongst the scaffolding holding most of the tunnels up. As you descend, mark the beams you come across. This will help others who follow in your stead to map their route and find their way back out.'
The tunnels beneath Emyn Ernil are a maze of twists and turns.
'Hopefully that will lead to fewer lost explorers over the next several days.'
Emyn Ernil Tunnels - Twists and Turns
Posts can be found in the tunnels beneath Emyn Ernil.\n\nGelloth asked you to venture beneath Emyn Ernil and mark the posts throughout the tunnels to aid in navigation.
Gelloth can be found in Dol Amroth.\n\nGelloth will be pleased to hear the posts have been marked.
